summary:
This is just a small mod that enables all enchantments for armor, clothing, ring or necklace.
Want to have every piece of armor with fortify archery? Now you can. It includes Requiem stuff too.
descriptionHtml:
[color=RED]Note to self, ignore this all of you:[/color] In requiem version of the mod, remember to esmify requiem and requiem hearthfire patch before opening with ck to prevent corruption. Ck does not see ESP as requirements otherwise because it sucks.

[color=RED]Description:[/color]
This is just a small mod that enables all enchantments for armor, clothing, ring or necklace.
Want to have every piece of armor with fortify archery? Now you can. 

[color=RED]What this mod DOES NOT change:[/color]
You STILL cannot add weapon enchantments to armor and vice versa. It will never be possible, no matter what, due to the way skyrim has been done.

[color=RED]Requirements:[/color]
Dawnguard
Hearthfires
Dragonborn
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19281/?]Requiem - The Roleplaying Overhaul by Xarrian and Ogerboss[/url]
Requiem Hearthfires patch(available at [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54562/?]Requiem Patch Central[/url])

[color=RED]Load order:[/color]
Place it after the required mods and their required mods, but BEFORE requiem for the indifferent.esp

If i missed something contact me and i will add it.
author: Cotoli
